input.description:
String Value - configuration name
Example: BCAN

An xml data structure in the following form.
<BCAN-Job> <change-id/> <task-id/> <job-id>BCA000073</job-id> <run-at-time>1248968160</run-at-time> <end-time/> <user-name>sysadmin</user-name> <site-url>https://localhost:443</site-url> <status-reason/> <change-type/> <timing-reason/> <change-timing>Latent</change-timing> <risk-level/> <comments/> <impact/> <urgency>High</urgency> </BCAN-Job>

An xml data structure in the following form.
<Configuration-Items> <Configuration-Item> <name>Persius1</name> <instance-id>AS0050560C63F2rpytRAn_CoAAWI0A</instance-id> </Configuration-Item> <Configuration-Item> <name>Papillon1</name> <instance-id>AS0050560C63F2L0K0RAX1htAQc5YA</instance-id> </Configuration-Item> </Configuration-Items>

output.description:
XML output with detail for one or more tasks
Example: <Tasks> <Task> <job-id>10001234</job-id> <task-id>TAS000000000007</task-id> <status>Work In Progress</status> <change-id>CRQ000000000021</change-id> <comments>Install Software</comments> <url /> <logs>***** Test Log Entry 05/28/2008 16:00 *****</logs> </Task> </Tasks>

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: 0-success,1-failure

String Value - Verbose Success status message
Example: The update completed successfully for TAS000000000157

call-process.process-name: :Closed_Loop-SA-Change_Management:Utilities:Update Task with URL and Job ID
:Closed_Loop-SA-Change_Management:Utilities:Update Task with URL and Job ID

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Task update successful for Task ID: ", .)
concat("Relationships created successfully for Task ID: ", .)
concat("Relationship creation failed for the following Task ID: ", .)
concat("Update failed with the following error message: ${task update message} for Task ID ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <parameters> <approve>${approval flag}</approve> <job-id>${job id}</job-id> <change-id>${change id}</change-id> <task-id>${task id}</task-id> <annotation> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">external approval</xsl:text> </annotation> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Change of status successfully updated for Job ID: ", .)
concat("Change of status successfully updated for Job ID: ", .)
concat("Unable to update status in the BCAN application for Change ID: ", .)
concat("No updates were required for Change ID: ", .)
concat("The update completed successfully updated for Change ID: ", .)

call-process.process-name: :Closed_Loop-SA-Change_Management:Utilities:Update Task with URL and Job ID

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Task update successful for Task ID: ", .)
concat("Relationships created successfully for Task ID: ", .)
concat("Relationship creation failed for the following Task ID: ", .)
concat("Update failed with the following error message: ${task update message} for Task ID ", .)
concat("Task not found for Task ID ", .)
concat("Ticket not found with Change ID ", .)
concat("Ticket not found with Task ID '${task id}' and Change ID ", . )
concat("Update failed with invalid status for Task ID ", .)
concat("Update failed with invalid status for Task ID ", .)
